incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Tigo Network in Guatemala

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to the Tigo network in Guatemala. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays to Tigo network in Guatemala. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays to Tigo network in Guatemala. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery delays to Tigo network in Guatemala. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Tigo network in Guatemala. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Globe Network in the Philippines

incident_updates.body: We are observing successful SMS delivery to the Globe Network in the Philippines. We will continue to monitor to ensure full service recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to experience SMS delivery failures to the Globe Network in the Philippines. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing  SMS delivery failures to Globe Network in Philippines via Pre-Registered Sender ID. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Failures to Kazakhstan Tele2 Network

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery failures to the Kazakhstan Tele2 Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Super SIM Over the Air Update Delays

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing Super SIM Over the Air (OTA) update failures for some SIM cards. The issue is preventing Super SIMs from retrieving their latest OTA setting and optimizing connectivity for devices. We've identified a fix which will be going into testing as soon as possible. We will provide an update on Tuesday with the status of our fix.

We are experiencing Super SIM Over the Air (OTA) update failures for some SIM cards. The issue is preventing Super SIMs from retrieving their latest OTA setting and optimizing connectivity for devices. Our engineering team is actively working with the affected service provider to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or sooner once more information becomes available.
Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with Super SIM. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Inter telecom Network Ukraine. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon and Yota

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 05 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 28 February 2024 at 16:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

05 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 05 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
07 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 07 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
12 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 12 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
14 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 14 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
19 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 19 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
21 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 21 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
26 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 26 February 2024 at 16:00 PST
28 February 2024 at 12:00 PST until 28 February 2024 at 16:00 PST

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Networks

incident_updates.body: A subset of small networks in the US are conducting a planned maintenance from 05 February 2024 at 21:00 PST until 06 February 2024 at 01:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US carrier networks.
